00048 #define ATT_INIT 1000000 /* Initial waiting time in order to get numerically 
00049                             an equilibrium M0z value at the beginning of a sequence */
00050                          
00051 #define ON 1
00052 #define OFF 0
00053 
00054 /*************************************************
00055 * Structure which groups together object information and experience conditions
00056 **************************************************/
00057 typedef struct _Experience3D {
00058     char name[TAILLE_NOM];
00059     
00061    int ntx, nty, ntz;      
00063    double readout_time;    
00065    int nfovx, nfovy, nfovz;         
00066 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
00067 
00069         int mpi_slice_x0;
00070    int mpi_slice_width;
00071 #endif
00072 
00073    float lx,ly,lz;
00075    double fovx,fovy,fovz;
00077    double obx,oby,obz;  
00079     float ***t1;     
00081     float ***t2;
00083    float ***ro;
00085    double to;
00087    float *** deltaB0;      
00089     float ****sgn;      
00091    double ****magstate; 
00092     /* Object center posiition */
00093     double xf,yf,zf;
00095    double px,py,pz;        
00097     double pt;       
00099    int FLAG_DECH;    
00101    float ***G_deche; 
00103    double B0;        
00105    int inhomogeneousB1;
00106     // Introduce complex B1(r) computed from external RF coil simulator.
00108    PPPVOLUME_COMPLEX_FLOAT B1t;
00110    PPPVOLUME_COMPLEX_FLOAT B1r;
00112    double b0def;        
00114    double G_edw;
00116    double FLAG_RESONANCE;
00117 
00118 } EXPERIENCE3D;
